import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react' import '../App.css' import data from "../data.json" import Image from '../assets/mercury.png' function Mercury() { let mercury = data[0] let active = { background: `#419EBB`, border: 'none' } let[overview, setOverview] = useState(mercury.overview.content) let [structure, setStructure] = useState(

{mercury.structure.content}

) let switchBtn = () => { console.log('hi') } let [hello, setHello] = useState(0) return (

{mercury.name}

{mercury.overview.content}

{hello}

Source: Wikipedia

{mercury.rotation}

{mercury.revolution}

); } export default Mercury;
